Build-Depends: cmake, debhelper-compat (= 13), libagg2-dev, libboost-dev, libexpat1-dev, libfastobj-dev, libflathashmap-dev, libfreetype-dev, libgflags-dev, libglm-dev, libharfbuzz-dev, libicu-dev, libjansson-dev, libkdtree++-dev, libminizip-dev, libprotobuf-dev, libpugixml-dev, libqt6svg6, libstb-dev, libutfcpp-dev, optipng, protobuf-compiler, python3-mapcss, python3-protobuf, qt6-base-dev, qt6-positioning-dev, qt6-svg-dev, curl <!nocheck>, xauth, xvfb
Description: offline maps with routing ability Organic Maps is a map application for travelers, tourists, hikers, and cyclists based on top of crowd-sourced OpenStreetMap data. It is privacy-focused and can be used without an Internet connection. It provides navigation for pedestrians, public transport, cycling and driving.
Package-List: organicmaps deb x11 optional arch=any organicmaps-data deb x11 optional arch=all
